subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: New file uploaded to EVP-ITC
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
Thanks Tinamarie;

I wonder if you could pcik up on the energy they supposedly focused on the 
box? That's something I'm skeptical about, as the box builder. I don't think 
it's needed. When I do my sessions I ask no questions, and don't ask for any 
particular spirit. I like to leave it open, and all enetities are welcome. I 
don't want to set up expectations, or limitations, but..that's only my way 
of running it.

Did you hear anything out of the box?

Frank-S
>From: Tinamarie bianchino <gypsyharlot1111@...>
>Reply-To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
>To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
>Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: New file uploaded to EVP-ITC
>Date: Sat, 21 Jul 2007 19:16:44 -0700 (PDT)
>
>Hi To All
>I have been listening to every posted file, and there are several that are 
>so distinct. This one is one of them! Very nice, very interesting, 
>definatley something happening! I am fixin to get my own and start as well. 
>I got to witness the box belonging to Bill Murphy at a Paranormal Meetup 
>group. This was the first time I had seen such a thing and to be honest at 
>first was a bit skeptical, even though I strongly believe and feel have 
>collected much credible evidence of paranormal activity for many years now. 
>I have come to conclude that I am extremely sensitive to energies as well 
>as extremely intuitive. The box has a definate energy about it. I continue 
>to read everything thats posted and listen in hope to grasp this whole 
>concept. I cant get it out of my mind. How amazing this form of EVP is. 
>Good job to all, hopefully I will be able to contribute some time soon. You 
>know years ago my kids had Furbies (sp?), and they would just start talking 
>out of no
>  where and say very revelent things that I felt was strange at the time 
>and out of context to anything my kids said....LOL, I wonder if there is 
>any connection. Maybe not but I never forget them, Frank's Box conjures up 
>the same energy to me.
>Tinamarie Sexton (gypsyharlot1111)
>Tinamarie
>
